document_data.name: Oolite
document_data.mainbody:
{{wikipedia article|Oolite}}
'''Oolite''', also known as '''ool stones''' in the lands around the [[Sea of Fallen Stars]], was a variety of [[wikipedia:en:quartz|quartz]] which occurred in tiny egg-shaped [[wikipedia:spherule|spherules]].
document_data.Description: These [[ornamental stones]] were usually solid brown in color and were very similar to [[algae]]. Individual oolite spherules were about {{frac|1|16}} in (1–2 mm) or less, which was too small to be cut.
document_data.Powers: Powdered ool stones were a prized ingredient when casting spells that purified or neutralized, and in making the magic [[ink]] for scribing those same spells.
